mapper.sql: PRESCHOOL_ID, QUESTION, SORT, QUESTION_AUDIO, RIGHT_ANSWER, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_PICTURE
mapper.insert: insert into GRADE_PRESCHOOL (PRESCHOOL_ID, QUESTION, SORT, QUESTION_AUDIO, RIGHT_ANSWER, QUESTION_TYPE, QUESTION_PICTURE) values (#{preschoolId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{questionAudio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

PRESCHOOL_ID,

mapper.update:
update GRADE_PRESCHOOL
QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUESTION_AUDIO = #{questionAudio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHT_ANSWER = #{rightAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_PICTURE = #{questionPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRESCHOOL_ID = #{preschoolId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update GRADE_PRESCHOOL set QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUESTION_AUDIO = #{questionAudio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHT_ANSWER = #{rightAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_PICTURE = #{questionPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PRESCHOOL_ID = #{preschoolId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_GRADE_BABY.nextval from dual
insert into GRADE_BABY(BABY_ID, BABY_NAME, BABY_AGE, ENGLISH_GRADE) values(#{babyId},#{babyName},#{babyAge},#{englishGrade})
insert into GRADE_SHEET(id, baby_id, answer, sort) values(SEQ_GRADE_SHEET.nextval,#{babyId},#{babyAnswer},#{sort})
